description: Detects a suspicious winrar execution in a folder which is not the default installation folder Author: Florian Roth, Tigzy. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
false_positives: Legitimate use of WinRAR in a folder of a software that bundles WinRAR
name: Winrar Execution in Non-Standard Folder
query: ((process.executable:(*\\rar.exe OR *\\winrar.exe) OR winlog.event_data.Description:"Command\ line\ RAR") AND (NOT (process.executable:(*\\WinRAR* OR *C\:\\Windows\\Temp* OR *\\UnRAR.exe*))))
